info.author: Andrea D'Este
info.description:
Description
===========

An installable plone 4 theme based on redomino.css3theme

Changelog
=========

1.8 (2012-10-03)
----------------
- added collapsed/expanded style in tinymce [sithmel]

1.7 (2012-07-27)
----------------

- fixed portal globalnav mobile [sithmel]

1.6 (2012-07-20)
----------------

- fixed IE classes [sithmel]

1.5 (2012-07-16)
----------------

- fixed print.css [adeste]
- added a IE9 class in main template [adeste]


1.0dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Hack around Products.tinyMCE 1.2.x and IE9:
  https://dev.plone.org/ticket/11690
  It can be reverted when released Products.tinyMCE > 1.3 [sithmel]
- moved the hack above in css3theme 1.3 version [sithmel]
- updated to css3theme 1.3 version [sithmel]
- fix mobile viewport [sithmel]
- new ploomcake artworks [sithmel]
- fix video resizing [sithmel]
- enabled pinch to zoom [sithmel]
info.name: ploomcake.theme
info.summary: An installable theme for Plone 4 based on redomino.css3theme
info.html_description:
Description

An installable plone 4 theme based on redomino.css3theme

Changelog

1.8 (2012-10-03)

  • added collapsed/expanded style in tinymce [sithmel]

1.7 (2012-07-27)

  • fixed portal globalnav mobile [sithmel]

1.6 (2012-07-20)

  • fixed IE classes [sithmel]

1.5 (2012-07-16)

  • fixed print.css [adeste]
  • added a IE9 class in main template [adeste]

1.0dev (unreleased)

  • Hack around Products.tinyMCE 1.2.x and IE9: https://dev.plone.org/ticket/11690 It can be reverted when released Products.tinyMCE > 1.3 [sithmel]
  • moved the hack above in css3theme 1.3 version [sithmel]
  • updated to css3theme 1.3 version [sithmel]
  • fix mobile viewport [sithmel]
  • new ploomcake artworks [sithmel]
  • fix video resizing [sithmel]
  • enabled pinch to zoom [sithmel]
